>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/mail/contact/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates a mail contact with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"description":"Mail contact ID","type":"integer"},"name":{"description":"New contact name","type":"string"},"description":{"description":"New contact description","type":"string"},"emails":{"description":"New list of contact emails","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"phoneNumbers":{"description":"New list of contact phone numbers","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Information about updated contact","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"ContactId":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"},"Name":{"type":"string","example":"name"},"Description":{"type":"string","example":"description"},"Emails":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"},"Value":{"type":"string","example":"value"},"IsPrimary":{"type":"boolean","example":"true"}},"title":"ContactInfo"}},"PhoneNumbers":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"},"Value":{"type":"string","example":"value"},"IsPrimary":{"type":"boolean","example":"true"}},"title":"ContactInfo"}},"Type":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"},"SmallFotoUrl":{"type":"string","example":"smallFotoUrl"},"MediumFotoUrl":{"type":"string","example":"mediumFotoUrl"}},"title":"MailContactData"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
